home.title: Shop Pocket
home.subtitle: Manage your lists with ease. Upload Excel files and create organized lists effortlessly.

auth.signInWithGoogle: Sign in with your Google account
auth.signUpWithGoogle: Sign up with your Google account

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your lists and items
dashboard.uploadDescription: Upload an Excel file to populate your reference items. This will be used when creating lists.
dashboard.yourListsDescription: View and manage all your shopping lists. Create new lists and add items from your reference catalog.
dashboard.referenceItemsDescription: Manage your reference items catalog. Add, edit, or delete items that can be used when creating lists.

lists.title: Your Lists
lists.subtitle: Manage your shopping lists. Click on a list to view and edit its items.
lists.noLists: No lists yet. Create your first list!
lists.noItems: No items in this list yet.
lists.removeItemConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this item?

addItems.title: Add Items to List
addItems.subtitle: Select items from your catalogs to add to this list
addItems.noItemsInCatalog: No items in this catalog. Upload an Excel file or add items manually.

referenceItems.title: Reference Items
referenceItems.subtitle: Manage your reference items catalog
referenceItems.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reference item?
referenceItems.noItemsYet: üí° No items yet. Upload an Excel file from the Dashboard to populate this catalog.
referenceItems.selectCatalogToView: Select a catalog to view items
referenceItems.name: Name
referenceItems.exportedSuccessfully: Reference items exported to Excel successfully!

excel.fileStructureDescription: Your Excel file should contain a reference table with product information. The parser will automatically detect the table structure.
excel.requiredColumnsDescription: The parser looks for these columns in consecutive order:
excel.codeColumnDescription: Contains "kod" or "code" in the header (e.g., "√úR√úN KODU", "Product Code")
excel.nameColumnDescription: Contains "ad", "name", "√ºr√ºn", or "product" in the header (e.g., "√úR√úN ADI", "Product Name")
excel.unitColumnDescription: Contains "birim", "unit", "koli", or "adet" in the header (e.g., "KOLƒ∞ ADET ƒ∞√áERƒ∞ƒûƒ∞", "Unit")
excel.tableLocationDescription: If your Excel file has multiple tables side by side, the parser will only read the left reference table.
excel.tableLocationNote: Any tables on the right side (starting from column F or beyond) will be automatically ignored.
excel.note1: Headers can be in Turkish or English
excel.note2: Duplicate product codes will be automatically removed (keeping the last occurrence)
excel.note5: The parser will automatically detect the header row (usually row 3)
excel.clickColumnHeaders: Click on column headers to select them. Showing first {count} rows.
excel.uploadExcelToPreview: Upload an Excel file to preview columns
excel.noDataFound: No data found in Excel file

catalog.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this catalog? All items in this catalog will also be deleted.
catalog.columnMappingsSaved: Column mappings saved successfully! Go to Dashboard and upload your Excel file.
catalog.configureColumnMappings: Please configure at least one column mapping for this catalog before uploading. Go to Reference Items page to configure them.
catalog.invalidExcelFile: Please upload a valid Excel file (.xlsx or .xls)
catalog.atLeastOneMapping: Please add at least one column mapping with both a field and column specified
catalog.duplicateColumns: Each column can only be mapped to one field. Please remove duplicate column mappings.
catalog.selectFieldForMapping: Please select a field for {count} column mapping(s). Each column needs a corresponding field.
catalog.mustHaveOneMapping: You must have at least one column mapping
catalog.noCatalogs: No catalogs available. Create one first.
catalog.needsColumnMappingsWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è This catalog needs column mappings configured. Go to Reference Items page to configure them.
catalog.uploadModeReplace: Replace (Delete existing items in this catalog and add new ones)
catalog.uploadModeMerge: Merge (Add to existing items, update duplicates)
catalog.dragDropExcel: Drag & drop your Excel file here
catalog.createNewCatalogDescription: Create a new catalog to organize your reference items. You can configure Excel column mappings later.
catalog.manageCatalogs: Manage your product catalogs. Each catalog can contain its own set of reference items.
catalog.clickSettingsToConfigure: Click the settings button (‚öôÔ∏è) next to this catalog to configure Excel column mappings before uploading files.

columnMapping.title: Configure Excel Column Mappings
columnMapping.subtitle: Map Excel columns to data fields. Add mappings one by one for each column you want to import.
columnMapping.uploadExcelDescription: Upload your Excel file to visually select columns. You can also manually enter column letters or header names below.
columnMapping.headerRowDescription: Row number containing headers (0 = first row, 1 = second row, etc.)
columnMapping.columnPlaceholder: Column letter (A, B, C) or header name
columnMapping.columnDescription: Column letter (A, B, C) or exact header name
columnMapping.tip: üí° Tip: You can specify columns by:
columnMapping.tip1: Column letter (A, B, C, D, etc.) - case insensitive
columnMapping.tip2: Exact header name from your Excel file (e.g., "√úR√úN KODU", "Product Code")
columnMapping.tip3: Add as many column mappings as you need using the "Add Column" button
columnMapping.tip4: You must have at least one column mapping
